properties.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; White Pine County; Northeastern Nye County
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 1 at 5:25PM PST by NWS Elko NV
properties.description:
A cold front is moving into central Nevada and will be bringing a
period of snow and gusty winds to the area. This will bring minor
accumulations of snow, though roads will be slick as wet roads
freeze over. Winds may also cause temporary visibility drops as
they blow the snow around. Please slow down and use caution if
having to travel in this area through 7 PM.

Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

NWSheadline: Snow showers with gusty winds will bring areas of difficult driving conditions
